section.title: OSGI R5 XML index repository adapter
section.para: This section is about the OSGi R5 XML index repository adapter.
This adapter provides and XML index file in the format specified by the OSGi Release 5 Enterprise specification, section 132.5.

The base entry point for this adapter is http://localhost:8080/r5. The first path parameter is the channel ID or name. So in order to install from the channel mtest1 use the following URI:
http://localhost:8080/r5/mtest1

note.title: Channel aspects
note.para: For this adapter to work it needs OSGi metadata, which is created by the OSGi channel aspect.
